testcase.classname: To calculates the time (hours, minutes, seconds) needed by a car B to catch another car A
testcase.name: A first invariant says that B cannot reach A with same speeds and positive lead.
testcase.system-out: Given a vehicle A with speed of 1 foot per hour.............................passed And a vehicle B with speed of 1 foot per hour...............................passed And vehicle A is leading by 1 foot..........................................passed When calculating the time needed by vehicle B to catch vehicle A............passed Then the resulting time is undefined........................................passed

testcase.classname: To calculates the time (hours, minutes, seconds) needed by a car B to catch another car A
testcase.name: A next invariant says that B cannot reach A if A is quicker.
testcase.system-out: Given a vehicle A with speed of 2 foot per hour.............................passed And a vehicle B with speed of 1 foot per hour...............................passed And vehicle A is leading....................................................passed When calculating the time needed by vehicle B to catch vehicle A............passed Then the resulting time is undefined........................................passed

testcase.classname: To calculates the time (hours, minutes, seconds) needed by a car B to catch another car A
testcase.name: A next invariant says that B is able to reach A in one hour if speed difference is one foot and lead is one foot.
testcase.system-out: Given a vehicle A with speed of 1 foot per hour.............................passed And a vehicle B is quicker than A by 1 foot per hour........................passed And vehicle A is leading by 1 foot..........................................passed When calculating the time needed by vehicle B to catch vehicle A............passed Then the resulting time is 1 hour.s.........................................passed

testcase.classname: To calculates the time (hours, minutes, seconds) needed by a car B to catch another car A
testcase.name: A next invariant says that more generally B is able to reach A in g hours if the difference of speed is one foot and lead is g feet. - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given a vehicle A with speed of 1 foot per hour.............................passed And a vehicle B is quicker than A by 1 foot per hour........................passed And vehicle A is leading by 1 foot..........................................passed When calculating the time needed by vehicle B to catch vehicle A............passed Then the resulting time is 1 hour.s.........................................passed

testcase.classname: To calculates the time (hours, minutes, seconds) needed by a car B to catch another car A
testcase.name: A next invariant says that more generally B is able to reach A in g hours if the difference of speed is one foot and lead is g feet. - Example #1.2
testcase.system-out: Given a vehicle A with speed of 2 foot per hour.............................passed And a vehicle B is quicker than A by 1 foot per hour........................passed And vehicle A is leading by 2 foot..........................................passed When calculating the time needed by vehicle B to catch vehicle A............passed Then the resulting time is 2 hour.s.........................................passed

testcase.classname: To calculates the time (hours, minutes, seconds) needed by a car B to catch another car A
testcase.name: A next invariant says that more generally B is able to reach A in g hours if the difference of speed is one foot and lead is g feet. - Example #1.3
testcase.system-out: Given a vehicle A with speed of 3 foot per hour.............................passed And a vehicle B is quicker than A by 1 foot per hour........................passed And vehicle A is leading by 3 foot..........................................passed When calculating the time needed by vehicle B to catch vehicle A............passed Then the resulting time is 3 hour.s.........................................passed

testcase.classname: To calculates the time (hours, minutes, seconds) needed by a car B to catch another car A
testcase.name: A next invariant says that B is able to reach A in one hour if the lead equals to the difference of speed. - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given a vehicle A with speed of 1 foot per hour.............................passed And a vehicle B is quicker than A by 1 foot per hour........................passed And vehicle A is leading by 1 foot..........................................passed When calculating the time needed by vehicle B to catch vehicle A............passed Then the resulting time is 1 hour.s.........................................passed

testcase.system-out: Given a vehicle A with speed of 2 foot per hour.............................passed And a vehicle B is quicker than A by 2 foot per hour........................passed And vehicle A is leading by 2 foot..........................................passed When calculating the time needed by vehicle B to catch vehicle A............passed Then the resulting time is 1 hour.s.........................................passed

testcase.classname: To calculates the time (hours, minutes, seconds) needed by a car B to catch another car A

testcase.classname: To calculates the time (hours, minutes, seconds) needed by a car B to catch another car A
testcase.name: A next invariant says that B is able to reach A in k hours if the difference of speed is a divisor of the lead, the factor being k. - Example #1.1

testcase.classname: To calculates the time (hours, minutes, seconds) needed by a car B to catch another car A
testcase.name: A next invariant says that B is able to reach A in k minutes if the difference of speed is the product of 60 by a given factor n, and the lead is the product of k by n. - Example #1.1

testcase.classname: To calculates the time (hours, minutes, seconds) needed by a car B to catch another car A
testcase.name: The set of invariants being complete, this last scenario proposes to run specific test samples. - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given a vehicle A with speed of 720 foot per hour...........................passed And a vehicle B with speed of 850 foot per hour.............................passed And vehicle A is leading by 70 foot.........................................passed When calculating the time needed by vehicle B to catch vehicle A............passed Then the resulting time is 0 hour.s 32 minute.s 18 second.s.................passed
